SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ApiClient
The ApiClient class provides methods to fetch data from a given URL.
CoinData
 
CoinDataList
The CoinDataList class represents a list of CoinData objects.
CoinDataSceneController
Controller class for the Coin Data Scene in a JavaFX application.
Currency
The Currency class represents a currency used in the context of cryptocurrency markets and transactions.
CurrencyList
The CurrencyList class handles the collection of supported currency strings.
CurrencySettings
The CurrencySettings class implements the Singleton design pattern to manage user's currency choice.
HistoryManager
The HistoryManager class follows the Singleton design pattern to manage the history of MarketData searches.
LoginSceneController
Controller class for the login scene in a JavaFX application.
Main
Main class for the JavaFX application.
MainSceneController
Controller class for the main scene in a JavaFX application.
MarketData
The MarketData class represents detailed information about a specific market.
MarketDataCache
The MarketDataCache class provides a caching mechanism for MarketData objects.
MarketDataList
The MarketDataList class manages a list of MarketData objects.
MarketDataPoint
The MarketDataPoint class represents a single data point in market data typically consisting of a timestamp and a corresponding price.
MarketDataSeries
The MarketDataSeries class represents a series of market data points.
